title: Blitzcrank Bot broken?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I know I'm a bit late on getting this whole promotional content deal, but the page for it is still up on Riot's site so I figured I'd have a go. I can't seem to trigger Blitzcrank Bot to respond though. 

I thought this thing was supposed to be instant, and it was the last time I used it to get Unchained Alistar. What gives?

replies.body:
BLITZBOT POROTYPE V4.1 POWERING UP....

GREETINGS SUMMONER. APOLOGIES FOR THE DELAY. 

RECORDS INDICATE A FAILED ATTEMPT TO ALLOCATE GAREN AND DREADKNIGHT GAREN. CONTENT SHOULD NOW BE AVAILABLE. 

GOOD LUCK ON THE FIELDS OF JUSTICE.
